thread.section_title: Jomashop Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Jomashop | www.jomashop.com | 9 of 257
thread.title: Michelle Yejin Kim
thread.title_full: Jomashop reviewed by Michelle Yejin Kim

author: Michelle Yejin Kim
title: Michelle Yejin Kim
text: I recently bought my boyfriend a Skagen watch for Christmas. The browsing experience was great. There is such a wide selection of brands. My boyfriend being part Danish, I always thought it'd be cool for him to have a Skagen watch when I learned that Skagen was a Scandinavian company. I was able to find his watch at such a good price. The delivery time was right on time for Christmas! They packaged the watch so thoroughly that it arrived completely unharmed. This was basically a perfect online purchase experience!
